alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 01 at 12:12AM MDT until April 01 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Critical fire weather conditions expected across portions of the area this afternoon... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 027, 041, 253, AND 254... * Affected Area...In Colorado, Fire Weather Zone 253 Kit Carson and Fire Weather Zone 254 Cheyenne. In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 027 Wallace and Fire Weather Zone 041 Greeley. * Timing...This afternoon, mainly between 12 PM and 7 PM MDT. * Winds...South to Southwest at 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 to 15 percent. * Temperatures...In the mid to upper 60s. * Impacts...Extreme and unpredictable fire behavior. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
info.instruction: Avoid outdoor burning. Repeating, outdoor burning is not advised today. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
